Package com.codigofacilito.fastmatrix

Class MatrixOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codigofacilito.fastmatrix.MatrixOperations
  • public class MatrixOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    The MatrixOperations class provides various methods for performing operations on matrices and vectors. It includes methods for scalar multiplication, element-wise multiplication, matrix multiplication, matrix-vector multiplication, dot product, and computing the trace of a matrix.

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> scalarProduct​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> M,
                                                                                       double a)
        Computes the scalar product of a scalar and a matrix.
        Parameters:
        M - the matrix to be multiplied, represented as a list of lists of Doubles.
        a - the scalar value to multiply each element of the matrix.
        Returns:
        the resulting matrix after scalar multiplication.
